text: The Only Way Is Essex (often known as TOWIE) is a BAFTA award-winning television soap opera. Based in Essex, England, it is a 'scripted reality' show. It has "real people in modified situations, saying unscripted lines but in a structured way".Grace Dent's TV OD - Review, The Guardian, 23 October 2010. The show is filmed just a few days in advance. Each series lasts six weeks. Series 1 started on 10 October 2010. It is narrated by Denise van Outen, who is from Basildon, Essex. Series 1-9 have been shown in Australia. Series one has been shown in South Africa. ==Cast== *James "Arg" Argent *Jess Wright *Lauren Pope *Chloe Sims *Billie Faiers == References == ==Other websites== *The Only Way Is Essex at itv.com Category:2010 British television series debuts Category:2010s British television series Category:The Only Way Is Essex Category:English-language television programs
title: The Only Way Is Essex
